contents:
我在挪威，了解情况。你google 4g network speed by country就知道了。...


Norway's Telenor picks Ericsson for 5G, abandoning Huawei

Telenor has picked Sweden’s Ericsson as the key technology provider for its fifth-generation (5G) telecoms network in Norway, it said on Friday, gradually removing China’s Huawei [HWT.UL] after a decade of collaboration over 4G.

Two smaller firms, Ice and Telia, have picked Nokia and Ericsson respectively for their Norwegian 5G networks.
挪威三家電信商兩家選擇Ericsson，一家選擇Nokia鋪設5G設備。最大的Telenor會逐步淘汰華爲設備。

Source: https://www.reuters.com/article/us-telenor-ericsson-huawei-tech/telenor-picks-ericsson-for-norway-5g-scaling-back-huawei-idUSKBN1YH0RM
